tool_description:
You only have to send us contact mobile numbers and we will filter the numbers registered on whatsapp
The service helps you to promote your services efficiently
title: Whatsapp Checker PRO

api_list.name: Validate PhoneNumber
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-checker-pro.p.rapidapi.com/{phone}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-checker-pro.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
